name: mobs_effects
title: Mobs Effects
short_description: Provides attribute effects for mobs based on Mobs Redo API, modifying movement, combat, and behavior attributes
long_description: Provides common effects for mobs based on Mobs Redo API powered by Attributes Effects mod. Supports modification of movement attributes (walk/run velocity, jump height), combat attributes (reach, damage, view range), behavior attributes (walk/stand/attack chance and patience), and animation/special features (animation speed, shoot interval, leap ability). See README.md in repository for more informations.
